definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: She bowled the ball smoothly down the lane.
sentences.chinese: 她很順當地把球投入地滾球場的球道。

sentences.english: Kathy and Susan are about to book a lane in their local bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 凱西和蘇珊正在當地的一家保齡球館準備預約球道。

sentences.english: Are plugs of compacted soil produced through aeration of fairways loose impediments?
sentences.chinese: 球道中積水井蓋上散落的淤泥算不算散置障礙物？

sentences.english: Please give this to our Lane Servant.
sentences.chinese: 請把這個給我們得球道服務生。

sentences.english: Quite an intimating hole not just long but also with big trees on both sides of the fairway.
sentences.chinese: 幾嚇人的球洞，碼數長之外，球道兩旁都系大樹。

sentences.english: The bowling alley is very smooth, and I fall down sometimes.
sentences.chinese: 保齡球道很滑，我有時候會滑倒。

sentences.english: He knew nothing about the setup of the bowling alley.
sentences.chinese: 他對設置一條保齡球道一無所知。

sentences.english: Do not practice in the form of stroking two balls in the fairway.
sentences.chinese: 請毋在球道內以擊打兩個球的形式進行練習。

sentences.english: Uhm, I think it'd be pretty neat walking down The Masters' 3)fairways .
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我想走在舉行名人賽的球道上一定特別爽。

sentences.english: Customers without membership card please pay a deposite of 200 Rmb per lane .
sentences.chinese: 散客消費請預付每條球道200元押金。

sentences.english: Nixon built a one-lane bowling alley below the driveway leading to the North Portico.
sentences.chinese: 尼克松在通向北門廊的行車道下方修了一條保齡球道。

sentences.english: Don is the league’s president, and he certifies the lanes every year.
sentences.chinese: 唐是聯賽的主席，他每年都會校正球道。

sentences.english: Tim and Denise go to the bowing alley.
sentences.chinese: 提姆和丹妮絲走向保齡球道。

sentences.english: The White Spider's bowling alley is frozen and silent.
sentences.chinese: 白蜘蛛冰原上的保齡球道結冰後安靜下來。

sentences.english: The weight shift in sand may be a little less than a regular fairway shot.
sentences.chinese: 在沙坑的重心轉移比在球道上擊球時略少一些。

sentences.english: I think it'd be pretty neat walking down the Masters fairways", she said."
sentences.chinese: “我認爲這將會是非常整齊走在名人賽球道”，她說。

definition: club (golf)/cue (billiards)/also written 球桿|球杆[qiu2 gan1]
